name: 2025 6th International Conference on Clean and Green Energy Engineering
content: Paper Publishing： For papers submitted to CGEE 2025, accepted and presented papers at the conference will be published in the proceedings of CGEE 2025, which will be sent to EI Compendex, Scopus for indexing. A set of selected papers with extended version (at least 40% new content) will be sent to Journal of Energy – Energija for review and published as regular papers after the conference, which will be indexed by Inspec, Google Scholar and Scilit.
organizers: the University of Zagreb and South Asia Institute of Science and Engineering
